the movie is 720p as stated but the compression is set so high the the quality of video would have been better at a normal DVD size, far far better.  Image is blurry at best. YIFFY dropped the ball on this one.

You just can't squeeze a BR into 550 MB and expect it to be decent quality. Seriously. YIFY, it's OK if you want to provide small filesizes for people with limited bandwidth, but better to drop the resolution and have better bit/pixel ratio than watching the artefact-fest this is.

Oh, by the way, movie sucks too ;-) Waste of time.
IMDB rates the movie at 3.9. I can see why Yify wanted it in his upload collection. Thanks!!
